original_title: Jacques Tati, tombé de la lune
overview: The crazy rise and fall of Jacques Tati, comedy genius, actor, director and athlete of laughter. Or how the inventor of the mythical Mr. Hulot made France laugh, then the world, flying from success to success, rising higher and higher, until he came a little too close to the sun.
title: Jacques Tati, tombé de la lune
